```{r nlme}
# library(nlme)
# 
d <- subset(caspar, substr(item, 1, 3) == "PHQ")
d <- d %>% group_by(id) %>%
  mutate(t = difftime(timestamp, timestamp[1], units = "days")) %>%
  mutate(t = as.numeric(t)) %>%
  mutate(t = round(t, 2))

fm1 <- nlme::lme(score ~ t, data = d, random = ~ 1 | id)
summary(fm1)
```
